metadata.title: CVE-2019-18812 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A memory leak in the sof_dfsentry_write() function in sound/soc/sof/debug.cin the Linux kernel through 5.3.9 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption), aka CID-c0a333d842ef.

criterions.comment: linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
